summary: This document is an email from BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko to an unspecified recipient, likely a law enforcement or corrections official. The reporter is inquiring about a potential leak from paramedics regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, noting that detailed information appeared on 4chan 45 minutes before mainstream media reported it. The email seeks verification of the leaked information and a statement on the situation.

persons.name: Jane Lytvynenko
persons.context: BuzzFeed News reporter who sent the email inquiring about a potential leak from paramedics regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the death report; the email concerns the leak of information about his death before mainstream media reporting.

events.title: Reporter inquiry about Epstein death leak
events.description: BuzzFeed News reporter Jane Lytvynenko sends an email inquiring about a potential leak from paramedics regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, noting that posts on 4chan appeared 45 minutes before ABC News reported it.

keyFacts: A BuzzFeed News reporter suspects paramedics involved in responding to Jeffrey Epstein's death leaked information online before mainstream media reports.
Posts containing details about Epstein's death appeared on the website 4chan 45 minutes before ABC News first reported it.
The reporter is seeking to verify the accuracy of the leaked information and obtain a statement from the recipient regarding the potential leak.
